name: test-server
afterHooks: sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/t-digi-space/current/storage && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/t-digi-space/current/public/uploads && sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/t-digi-space/current/storage && sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/t-digi-space/current/public/uploads && php /var/www/t-digi-space/current/artisan storage:link && php /var/www/t-digi-space/current/artisan migrate

name: prod-server
afterHooks: sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/digispace.pro/current/storage && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/digispace.pro/current/public/uploads && sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/digispace.pro/current/storage && sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/digispace.pro/current/public/uploads && php /var/www/digispace.pro/current/artisan storage:link && php /var/www/digispace.pro/current/artisan migrate
